Title: You're the Only Person I Can Trust
Writer: Courtney A. Kemp (created by), Lauren Schmidt, Vladimir Cvetko (story editor), Safia M. Dirie (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: Ghost struggles to keep Angela, Tommy and others in his control; Simon Stern prevents Ghost from regaining his club.
